channel.title: bye on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in bye on Barefoot Rob

item.title: left Japanese class a bit early
item.description: 21:17 Monday 29 June 2015 JST Japanese class discussion ran a bit late and I felt anxious to prepare for work tomorrow so I left before the discussion had finished… it sounded like it would go easily at least 20 more minutes. I can see Lin’s concerns with the class; it’s great in some ways but isn’t really good for comprehensive learning. Gotta find a teacher / real class fo real.

item.title: leaving toy store
item.description: ##18:30 Tuesday 10 March 2015 JST## Using my new verb 手伝う, I asked Shibata if there was anything I could do to help around the store. She was like, “really?” and I go yeah! and ended up helping her make an image of a ship using stackable soft-plastic building blocks. Shibata said she is leaving the toy store soon. Boooo. She’s gonna work somewhere in Tachikawa, so soon it’ll be さよなら time.
